QuestData.Title: Scouting Report: Like Jinyu in a Barrel
QuestData.Description: With our leader turned to jade, our hozen guide disappeared, and a prisoner of war in tow, there was only one thing that Kiryn and I could do:$b$bMarch into our enemy's territory and deliver some vengeance.$b$bWant to know how it went?

Objectives.Objective: Escort Shademaster Kiryn through the camp
